titles.title: Early Stage Design Optimization for Passive Strategy Workflow (ESDOPS Workflow)

subject._subjectScheme: Australian and New Zealand Standard Research Classification (ANZSRC), 2008
Australian and New Zealand Standard Research Classification (ANZSRC), 2008

contributorName.__text: TU Delft, Faculty of Architecture and the Built Environment, Architecture, Urbanism and Building Sciences

formats.format: Rhino and Grasshopper file with folder structure and excel files for data recording

description.__text:
This folder contains the developed workflow described in “Early Stage Optimization Workflow Towards a Climate-Responsive Design” where a multi-objective comparison process can be accessed through the developed user-interface using HumanUI and a multi-objective optimization can be processed through Wallacei.

The folder contains:

  • Grasshopper workflow with the folder structure.
  • READ ME file included with instructions.

Please read the instructions carefully as the file references are required for the workflow's functionality.
